bug.short_desc: Generator key error with specific packages configuration

long_desc.thetext:
The original mamba config.json with its two-part parts definition leads to a key error when the generator processes the project.
The mamba project with its original configuration will be added to qooxdoo-contrib/Bugs, a generator stack trace will be attached to this bug.

On 'generate.py build' in the mamba library (s. qooxdoo-trunk/Bugs/2009/mamba), the following stack trace is produced:
>>> Resolving part dependencies... - Collapsing part packages... Traceback (most recent call last): File "/home/thron7/workspace/qooxdoo-contrib.trunk/qooxdoo/qooxdoo-0.8.1-sdk/tool/bin/generator.py", line 144, in <module> main() File "/home/thron7/workspace/qooxdoo-contrib.trunk/qooxdoo/qooxdoo-0.8.1-sdk/tool/bin/generator.py", line 139, in main Generator(config, job, console).run() File "/home/thron7/workspace/packages/qooxdoo-0.8.1-sdk/tool/pylib/generator/Generator.py", line 397, in run partPackages, packageClasses = self._partBuilder.getPackages(partIncludes, smartExclude, classList, collapseCfg, variants, minPackageSize, minPackageSizeForUnshared) File "/tmp/qx/packages/qooxdoo-0.8.1-sdk/tool/pylib/generator/code/PartBuilder.py", line 24, in getPackages File "/tmp/qx/packages/qooxdoo-0.8.1-sdk/tool/pylib/generator/code/PartBuilder.py", line 178, in _collapseParts KeyError: u'main
The test data had to be removed from contrib/Bugs.
Test data is available on the internal SVN.
Confirmed by the original reporter, this issue can be closed as INVALID.
